sentences.sContent: This slow-motion disaster, demography insists, cannot be avoided without a major shift in resources.
sentences.sContent_eng: This slow-motion disaster, demography insists, cannot be avoided without a major shift in resources.
sentences.sCn: 这是一场缓慢进行的灾难，人口统计学仍坚持不能避免资源的主要转移。

words.tran: 人口统计学的；人口学的
[统计] 人口统计学家，人口学家

trans.tranOther: the study of human populations and the ways in which they change, for example the study of how many births, marriages and deaths happen in a particular place at a particular time
